name: cantaloupe
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of melon (= large fruit with a thick skin) that is round and has yellow or green skin and sweet orange flesh

a round melon (= fruit) with yellow or green skin and sweet, orange flesh: Cantaloupes from Texas are extremely good this year.
